article_title: Air Canada suspends flights into 4 N.B. airports
article_description: Air Canada has postponed a number of domestic flights that will affect four New Brunswick airports until the end of April
article_content: Air Canada has postponed a number of domestic flights that will affect four New Brunswick airports until the end of April Air Canada has reduced its domestic flights from 62 airports to 40 until April 30 The suspended flights include ul li Flights f   779 chars
